title: CS 354 or CS 525 or CS 540 over summer
body:
Basically the title. I am doing research in Madison and my lab is flexible so attending in person lectures isn't a problem. Just wanted to know opinions about each course during the summer from people that have taken it before. 

Thanks
comments: Quick question, how’d you get the research?
CS 525 is more of a math class, being proofs-based and whatnot. If that is something you are interested in, you should take it.
I’m assuming you are already enrolled in all of them since they are probably already full by now. Which professors did you enroll with?
